channel.title: EYE on SXY
channel.description: Recent content in EYE on SXY

item.title: EYE SEE YOU, Interactive Installation, in a 3m*3m space
item.description: [1] Workshop “Mirror In Our Hands” Workshop Mentor: Katrin Leitner-Peter, Germany, Kunsthochschule, Kassel (Professor Kartrin is currently teaching at the Kunsthochschule Kassel in Germany, focusing on exploring the relationship between painting, installation, performance and digital media art and conducting experiments. Her research on digital media art are widely disseminated in the industry and are regarded as classics.) Question: How does our online life and digital existence affect our reality and material existence?
